snippet.title: Official Mecho Wars: Desert Ashes Trailer
snippet.description:
Mecho Wars: Desert Ashes by Oyaji Games

Mecho Wars: Desert Ashes is a direct sequel to the hit game, Mecho Wars.

Returning to Luc Bernard's genuinely bizarre and beautiful world, players are challenged with a whole new wave of Turn Based Strategy insanity. Sparnus, the leader of the Winged Crusade has embarked on a journey to save his people by enlisting the aid of the unstable yet brutally powerful Desert Witch.

Determined to bring absolute destruction to the Winged Crusade, Jumali and his twisted mechanized Landians, will stop at nothing to thwart Sparnus at every chance.

Homepage:

http://oyajigames.com/
